title: #HwInfiniBandInterface.v1_0_0.HwInfiniBandInterface

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Oem.description: This is the manufacturer/provider specific extension moniker used to divide the Oem object into sections.
Oem.longDescription: The value of this string shall be of the format for the reserved word *Oem*.

LinkStatus.description: The link status of this interface (port).
LinkStatus.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the link status of this interface (port).

IPv4Addresses.description: The IPv4 addresses currently assigned to this interface.
IPv4Addresses.longDescription: The value of this property shall be an array of objects used to represent the IPv4 connection characteristics for this interface. It is recommended that this propety be regarded as read-only, with configuration of static addresses performed by updating the values within IPv4StaticAddessses. Services may reject updates to this array for this reason.

IPv6Addresses.description: Enumerates in an array all of the currently assigned IPv6 addresses on this interface.
IPv6Addresses.longDescription: The value of this property shall be an array of objects used to represent the IPv6 connection characteristics for this interface.

IPv6DefaultGateway.description: This is the IPv6 default gateway address that is currently in use on this interface.
IPv6DefaultGateway.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the current IPv6 default gateway address that is in use on this interface.

UUID.description: The universal unique identifier (UUID) for this interface.
UUID.longDescription: The value of this property shall be used to contain a universal unique identifier number for the interface. RFC4122 describes methods that can be used to create the value. The value should be considered to be opaque. Client software should only treat the overall value as a universally unique identifier and should not interpret any sub-fields within the UUID. If the system supports SMBIOS, the value of the property should be formed by following the SMBIOS 2.6+ recommendation for converting the SMBIOS 16-byte UUID structure into the redfish canonical xxxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx string format so that the property value matches the byte order presented by current OS APIs such as WMI and dmidecode.

InterfaceType.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the type of this interface (port).

RelatedPort.description: This is a reference to a Network Port that is associated with this Infiniband Interface.
RelatedPort.longDescription: This is a reference to a Network Port that is associated with this Infiniband Interface.

enumDescriptions.LinkUp: The link is available for communication on this interface.
enumDescriptions.NoLink: There is no link or connection detected on this interface.
enumDescriptions.LinkDown: There is no link on this interface, but the interface is connected.
